Posts.Content: On 6/22/2007 Leemg wrote: Hi!  I work for a doctor but I'm not a medical doctor just a patient.  I have had breast cancer found on mammo identified by micro calcifications but I also was recently diagnosed with thyroid cancer.  This forms nodules in and around your thryoid gland which may or may not be felt by you.  I also have a cancerous nodule that showed up on ultrasound in the neck lymph nodes.  Thryoid can also present in the upper chest.  Of course, breast is one type of cancer associated with swollen or noticeable nodes in the axillary area.  My point is you really need to get one biopsied to get a definitve diagnosis.  No matter what type of cancer it may be and it could possibly be something unrelated, that particular type cancer cell will show up in the biopsy, no matter where the displaced lymph node or tumor, a biopsy will discern.  Best of luck!  Hopefully, you just have some infection process going on and this will just be temporary.  thanks for the encouragement, i guess i am thinking the worse since my mother died at the age of 43 same age as myself from met cancer in the uterus. i just had labs done about 2-3 weeks ago. a tsh,cbc,cmp,flp everything was normal,so if an infection was there looks like it would have showed up but then ago if it where cancer there probably should have been some abn in the cbc at least. cancer is very dominant on both sides of my parents. i also had a spot on my arm biopsied about a year ago, that was precancerous. but anyway just rattling my brain trying to think of why these nodules would be here.
Posts.Title: nodules

Posts.Content: just needing a medical opinion, i have had fibrocystic breast for years. but aroung 4 days ago i accidently came upon some palpable nodules in the upper chest wall just beneath the collar bone,nontender some movable some fixed. ive noticed some small pea size nodule axilla area also. im sch to see a surgeon next month, for possible biopsy.. im a lpn ive been around patients with breast cancer and heard people talk about how they came to discover the nodules in the breast but ive nev er heard anyone mention the upper chest, i know that is breast tissue also. just a thought.
Posts.Title: nodules
